text: Princess Ayako of Japan has renounced her royal title in order to marry commoner, named Kei Moriya. The two wed Monday at the Meiji Shrine in Tokyo, which marks Ayako's official exit from the royal world. Per Japanese royal law, Ayako was forced to renounce her Princess title since her now - husband lacks any royal or aristocratic titles ( or family members ).
